title: Patent Patrol: FSA wireless drivetrain with wireless charging?
content:
FSA is one of the few brave companies that went toe to toe with drivetrain giants. If today’s patent is any indication, FSA isn’t done innovating. This patent appears to indicate an FSA wireless drivetrain is in the works — one that even incorporates wireless charging. In 2016 FSA launched its WE drivetrain, a semi-wireless […]

The post Patent Patrol: FSA wireless drivetrain with wireless charging? appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Dan Cavallari
